name: BATTLE TRAIN
description:
You are the pilot of a large armed cargo train on it's way back from an allied city. You pass between two canals and is ambushed by an army of tanks. Use your auto-firing-cannon to take out the tanks and use your large artillery to destroy bridges and halt enemy reinforcements. Created for the GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours alone.

This game matches the theme of Multi-Purpose design by...

-Aiming one way also aims another gun in the other direction.

-Heat slows fire but also sets off your artillery

-Destroying bridges gives both health and reduces enemy forces

Resources:

-Gamemaker 1.4 engine
